creator: Perdoo
descriptionHtml:
Forgot to update your goals prior to a meeting? Traveling back from a big event where you've acquired 10 more leads? With our new mobile app, you'll always carry around your most important goals and can update them on the go!

Perdoo is a simple but powerful OKR+ platform that turns great strategies into amazing results. Perdoo brings your strategy, goals (KPIs & OKRs), and people together on an easy-to-use platform. It enables you to communicate strategy in real-time, so that teams and employees can align their efforts to drive the results that matter.

Sign up for a FREE account on perdoo.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to a brand new version of the Perdoo mobile app.

What's new:
- Check-ins
- Statuses
- SSO via Google and SAML
- Tablet support

The new mobile app does not (yet) support:
- Commenting on goals
- Viewing goals from other users and groups
- Details pages for Key Results and Initiatives

Send us your feedback and let us know how we can further improve the mobile experience for you!

title: Perdoo

creator: Perdoo
descriptionHtml:
Perdoo is the #1 software for Strategy, Goals, and Feedback.

Organizations across the world use Perdoo to:
- Align everyone with the strategy
- Focus teams on what matters
- Engage employees to achieve goals and feel their best

Our new mobile app allows you to:
- Keep track of your OKRs & KPIs
- Update your goals on the go
- Manage all your 1:1s in one place
- Track 1:1 Talking points and Action items
- Check-in

Get your FREE Perdoo account on www.perdoo.com
